title: Smart Task Agent & Campaign Autopilot (Step 1 of 4)

requirements.text: Create a Smart Task Agent page at route '/smart-task-agent'. The page must include: (1) An auto-task generator form where the user enters a goal and the app breaks it down into actionable steps displayed as a checklist. (2) A priority queue panel that lists tasks ranked by deadline and dependency — tasks can be marked complete, reordered by priority (High/Medium/Low), and have a due date. (3) A task completion tracker that, when a task is marked done, auto-suggests the next logical step from the remaining queue. All task data must be persisted to localStorage.

quotes: Auto-task generator that breaks down goals into actionable steps
Priority queue that re-ranks tasks based on deadlines and dependencies
Task completion tracker with auto-suggestions for next steps

acceptanceCriteria: User can enter a goal and generate a list of actionable sub-tasks
Tasks display priority (High/Medium/Low) and due date
Completing a task triggers a 'Next Step' suggestion banner
Tasks persist across page refreshes via localStorage
Page is linked in the AppSidebar under a new 'AI Agent' section

requirements.text: Create a Campaign Autopilot page at route '/campaign-autopilot'. The page must include: (1) A content auto-scheduler section where the user defines optimal posting windows (day of week + time of day) per platform, and scheduled posts from the backend are surfaced in that order. (2) A campaign health monitor panel that reads existing ad campaign data (spend, CTR, conversions) and flags campaigns as Healthy, At Risk, or Underperforming based on user-defined thresholds. (3) A performance summary generator that, on demand or on a set daily/weekly schedule stored in localStorage, produces a plain-text summary card of campaign activity. All configuration must be persisted to localStorage.

quotes: Auto-schedule content based on optimal posting windows you define
Campaign health monitor that flags underperforming campaigns
Auto-generate performance summaries on a set schedule

acceptanceCriteria: User can configure posting windows per platform and see posts sorted accordingly
Campaign health monitor displays color-coded status badges (Healthy/At Risk/Underperforming) for each ad campaign
User can set thresholds for CTR and conversions to drive health classification
Performance summary card is generated on demand with a single button click
Summary schedule (daily/weekly) is configurable and persisted to localStorage
Page is linked in the AppSidebar under the 'AI Agent' section

requirements.text: Add an 'AI Agent' navigation group to the AppSidebar containing links to '/smart-task-agent' (Smart Task Agent) and '/campaign-autopilot' (Campaign Autopilot). The group should appear after the existing Digital Marketing section and use a bot/robot icon consistent with the app's dark teal design system.
acceptanceCriteria: A new 'AI Agent' collapsible group appears in the sidebar below the Digital Marketing section
Links to Smart Task Agent and Campaign Autopilot are visible and navigate correctly
Icons and styling match the existing sidebar design

constraints: Do not modify any existing pages, backend logic, or sidebar groups already present
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
All new state must use localStorage — no new backend schema changes required for this step
nonGoals: Sending emails or posting to social media directly
Connecting to live external AI models
